item.title: Warren Buffett’s 2 secrets for hiring great leaders
item.description: ‘You have to have a clear vision,’ Buffett told Fortune’s Susie Gharib at the Berkshire Hathaway shareholder meeting in 2015.

item.title: ‘Hawk tuah’ girl Haliey Welch launches crypto memecoin—but insists it’s not a cash grab
item.description: An interview with the viral sensation as she wades into murky legal waters.

item.title: Why Fifth Third’s CIO mostly buys rather than builds tech in the race to compete against banking giants
item.description: To compete, Fifth Third CIO Jude Schramm leans into partnering with software providers, favoring a "buy" versus build approach.

item.title: Exclusive: Reasoner, a startup from Crashlytics’ co-founder, claims a breakthrough in making AI reliable enough for the enterprise
item.description: Serial entrepreneur Wayne Chang says Reasoner's neurosymbolic approach avoids the risks of using generative AI.

item.title: Taco Bell will let you turn that taco run into a photo shoot with drive-thru photo booths
